评论详情: The color of this outfit is absolutely stunning and it holds up in the washer really well. The design is so cute and worth every penny. The material is so stretchy and gentle. This outfit fits my girl perfectly and it's true to size. The images on the pants are very clear and vibrant. The elastic on the waistband is really stretchy and durable.

I absolutely LOVE this outfit!!! The colors are bright and pretty. I love the style. It's comfortable for my daughter to wear. It will be perfect for this fall to keep her warm. It fits true to size. I got the size 3-4t for my 27lbs, 3ft 1in, 3 year old daughter, and it fits perfectly.
Perfect fit for stated months, nice material, good quality.
The Ichigobaby outfit in "yellow" is adorable. I love the soft, buttery feel of the pants and the ruffles at the bottom of the legs just pull it all together so nicely.

I'm happy with this outfit. The colors are vibrant and the fabric is soft. It feels well made; won't fall apart after a few washes. The sizing looks accurate and comparable to standard US sizing. I'm excited for my daughter to grow into this.
The ruffles are what makes this outfit stand out for me. They look so cute. The material is good quality and stretchy. Worth paying a little extra for.

This is really cute, in a way only a toddler could pull off! The cuffs on the pants keep them from being stepped on even if the pants are too long. The fabric is quite thin and a tiny bit of see through, but also very soft and silky.

I saw this and loved the beautiful colors.  I'm trying to get baby stocked with some new winter clothes since winter will come sooner or later.Since baby already has a lot of pink and purple items,  I ordered the blue.  Plus, I thought it was the prettiest of the offered colors.I ordered this a size too big for baby.  By winter this will be the perfect size for her.  I just can't get over how awesome the colors are in person.The material is nice and soft - great quality.  There were no stitching flaws at all.  I laundered it last night and it came out just fine.  Still soft and colorful and it didn't look like there was any shrinkage.I'm so happy I got this - it will look so nice on baby!  I'm satisfied completely and recommend this cute outfit!
